General.Name: Anhui Andeli Department Store Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Anfu Battery Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of batteries for household appliances in China. The company was formerly known as Anhui Andeli Department Store Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Anfu Battery Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2022. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.
General.Address: No. 1, Wenming Middle Road, Hefei, China
